name: OVS Moodle
description: Moodle style for Ojai Valley School Moodle in Boost theme.
additional_info:
To change Moodle to boost theme:
1. Click on your user icon (top right) and choose Preferences.
2. Under the "User Account" section, choose Edit Profile.
3. Find the "Preferred theme" preference and change to Boost.
4. Scroll to the bottom of the page and click on the Update Profile button.
